Text: Shankly - Thanks again for a great years music. I will have the art complete later today for all the 12 months, plus the Best of's plus The Christmas set. I can't post them until 10th as I'm stuck Offshore but will get them up asap. How should I post it as the first 6 months is still running. May split it or just have one torrent with the lot. Happy New Year and thank you Shankly for a great year in music. Your downloads/mixtapes have brought me many hours of fun. I hope that you will continue to do this for many years to come. Be sure that I will follow your offerings fervently.

Best Regards,
Bluegamba.

Thanks and Happy New Year to everyone.
